abstract: Security crackdown in Tunisia amid terrorist attacks and threats is raising concerns among citizens who fear that hard-fought liberties achieved during Arab Spring will vanish as government takes steps to combat jihadists.
lead_paragraph: Recent attacks have provoked a security crackdown that has Tunisians wondering if they can fight terrorism without giving up hard-won freedoms.

headline.main: Change in Militant Tactics Puts Tunisians on Edge
headline.print_headline: Terrorist Threats, and Resulting Security Crackdown, Put Tunisians on Edge

snippet: Recent attacks have provoked a security crackdown that has Tunisians wondering if they can fight terrorism without giving up hard-won freedoms.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
